name: Burger & Lobster Bryant Park
address: 132 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

reviews.text: Gray was awesome took such great care of us and it was our first time so we will definitely be back!!!
Delicious!
Great music - great staff - Angie, Eddy, Gray & Lester - fab food - lobster to die for and Apple and cinnamon cake was awesome. Better than the London branch
Amazing food and amazing service! Thank you to our server Adam, who was so attentive and welcoming
Adam was an amazing server and made us feel so welcome! It was such a great experience and atmosphere, and of course the food was incredible! Definitely will be back :)
Adam was a great server and was always making sure you had everything you need!
Adam was amazing! Attentive and courteous to our needs

Luca  the GM and Daniel bar crew give us a great experience and such a great introduction of food and drinks I have to highlight the shrimp chili garlic plate and the delicious margaritas I would definitely come back to try more food and drink the bar ambiance feels great as soon as you walk in First, we have great service by Daniel the bartender and great us right away with a great suggestion
Thanks for such as a great experience

My wife and I really enjoyed eating here. Our food was delicious and both of our servers were great! Our drinks were on point too. Back to the  food. My burger and lobster combo was10/10 I normally donâ€™t eat lobster but my waitress suggested getting grilled and steamed and it was great. My wife enjoyed her lobster roll  but wished she went with the warm instead of cold option. We will back and will tell our friends and fam to come by.

I ordered the lobster bisque starter. the bisque was soup with tiny croutons decorated onto the soup.  The soup didnâ€™t have lobster meat. The lobster bisque was served with a grilled cheese sandwich. the portion was small but complimented the soup serving size. It wasnâ€™t bad but I should have opted for a different starter item.

I ordered the lobster caesar salad as my main dish. The salad had a fair amount of lobster on a bed of salad. The croutons, while tasty, seemed to be layered at the bottom of the salad, causing the illusion of a full salad. I really enjoyed the parmesan crisp added to the salad as it elevated the overall flavor.

If I return, I might opt for the lobster and prawn burger or the lobster roll.
Without words, food, personalâ€¦everything was perfect!!!
Belle expÃ©rience. Les plats sont dÃ©licieux. Le service impeccable et le cadre trÃ¨s agrÃ©able.
Always such a great experience here at B&L! Our server Adam was so sweet and gave the best recommendations!
Adam was amazing!! So pleasant and helpful with the menu.

Adam was a wonderful and knowledgeable waiter
He was very attentive with out being too overbearing..  He made a my 1st experience at this restaurant very good.
Great staff-Adam was enthused, made great menu recommendations and was very kind!
The lobster Caesar salad is a HUGE disappointment. Itâ€™s a pile of romaine with about $7 of lobster on top. Not one croton. The dressing is very thick and overpowers the lobster.

the Chelsea location was so much better. Its was a place to enjoy. This location felt stuffy.food was ok salty . Drinks super sweet.   I wont be going back.

Fantastic restaurant! Everything was fresh and full of flavor.
The service was friendly and fast â€” big thanks to Lester for such a warm welcome and amazing hospitality.
Highly recommend this place to everyone visiting the area.
Greetings from Lviv ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦
Great place, very tasty, prices are moderate, atmosphere and service are at a high level! Special thanks to Lester for his professionalism and great communication!!!!! Greetings from Lviv!
The food was delicious, the service was excellent, and special thanks to Lester for his warm hospitality and the great atmosphere! Greetings to him from Lviv!!!
A wonderful establishment, everything was at the highest level, we are sincerely grateful to Lester for his professionalism and sincerity, we will return to this place every time!
I had the lobster roll and it was delicious! The lobster was fresh, buttery, and full of flavor. The roll was warm and perfectly toasted. Great food and good vibes â€” Iâ€™d definitely go back!

Excellent all around! Our server Chris was THE BEST and the food was even better than we hoped for. Oysters were some of the best and biggest Iâ€™ve ever had. Get the combo for 2, and the lobster rolll and parm truffle fries will change your life.
Coming from UK to B&L, NYC. It rocked. Sorry uk, but the NYC is better x
if you like lobster rolls this place is great

One of our favorite restaurants to go when visiting New York.

The combination is epic for your taste buds.

And we havenâ€™t found a better lobster roll than this one.

Perfectly toasted and filled to the brim with lumps of lobster.

You will not be disappointed going to this establishment.

Adam was our waiter. He was excellent. It is delightful to be served by staff who is happy to be here. He was friendly, courteous, and made excellent recommendations. Every table he served were very happy. Food was great been coming here since 2016 (since the old location). There was a birthday celebration where all the staff came to sing. Just a happy environment to be all around after a good broadway show.
Adam was absolutely fantastic. Best service we have had in a while. The lobster smash burger and lobster rolls are absolutely amazing. Everything was perfect.

First time here and I loved it! Food and drinks were amazing. Adam recommended we try the lobster Mac & Cheese and it was delicious. Daniel made incredible drinks at the bar, and even accommodated me by making me a delicious mock-tail! Lester provided great service all throughout the night. Come check this place out!
so amazing. best place ever. best service

Danielll the Bartender THEEEEEE BESTTTTTT !!!!
The whole staff Lester, Adam Thank you sooo muchhhh !!!
Daniel at the bar aways has great suggestions! The new smash burgers are great!
Great place service is awesome, and food is big and quality
Canâ€™t go wrong if you want a burger or a lobster & if you want both, youâ€™re also in the right place! Food is always great and so is the service. Good location for business/casual dining.

Location - great if you enjoy walking up to dinner and going through an alley filled with people smoking weed.

Restaurant itself:  Once in the restaurant, the elevator does not work so it is not ada accessible and one would need to walk up to two flights of stairs to reach an empty and sad looking restaurant that once was.

Hereâ€™s the thing too - you never want to order any lobster dish from a restaurant that isnâ€™t busy.

So, Itâ€™s a toss up between what was worse. The service or the food. We had to deal with Lester who clearly didnâ€™t want to be there, didnâ€™t fix our issues, and was just going back and forth aimlessly since there was hardly anyone else to attend to.

The concept seems good - burgers and lobsters but when you are paying over $40 for one and both are made poorly with ingredients that donâ€™t taste fresh then it becomes a terrible concept.

If Burger & Lobster changes their staff and replace them with people who actually want to be there as well as make better food that is worth even half the price, then it would make for a far better dining experience.

Great place with a nice atmosphere, good food, great service and especially great music. Me and my friends were vibing the entire time. Waiter Nowshad was extremely kind and also really seemed to enjoy his work!
It must been just my lobster that was a little over cooked because my whole party lived their meals! I will definitely give them another try!

ğŸ” Burger and Lobster ğŸ¦ is one of our all time NYC favorites! If I was on death row the Beast burger would be in my top five contenders to be my last meal! Itâ€™s that good! Had a great experience tonight with Daniel at the Bar, and itâ€™s not the first time we have dined with Daniel, he always does an excellent job! Over the years we have also sat with Maddie in the dining room and also bar and have had excellent experiences. The food is amazing and service is also excellent, would highly recommend!
Daniel The Bartender was excellent! Great service & so helpful!
Daniel the bartender made our time here a great experience, ask for him when you stop by! Will definitely stop by again.
Daniel the bartender was amazing. Christian the server was hilarious. 10/10 will be back
Malachi was amazing he did a great job. He was very attentive and funny. I recommend him 100%

Very disappointing experience.  I ordered fries just to find out they cook their shrimp in the same oil.  Why would you do that?!? For one that's gross and secondly shellfish allergies.  The waitress took our order and never came back. We were served by one person with no check back and had to eventually ask another waitress for our check. We literally had no other interaction from our waitress after taking the order.

I ordered the beyond burger and it didn't have the fixings on it as described.  I ate it as it was because I didn't want it to get cold. One thing I can say is good job on at least alerting us about the cross contamination factor.  I won't eat there again.
Food was excellent!
Always makes for a nice lunch spot ... never too crowded and can have dessert at lady m after + relax in Bryant Park.

Adam was a delight and clearly a hard worker! All of our food came out quickly and was prepared perfectly. Anything we needed during the meal was taken care of almost as soon as we could have the thought to ask! 10/10 thanks to our server and your lovely staff.
Food was amazing!! And thank you to Adam for being super welcoming and giving us the best food recommendations from the menu we enjoyed every bite!

I had this amazing lobster pasta for dinner today! It was a delicious experience that Iâ€™ve never had before. Highly recommend this place for having pasta, burger and lobster. And my server David was so kind and considerate. Iâ€™m so thankful for him to make my days here so special. It will be an unforgettable moment to me. The Burger & Lobster restaurant is an amazing casual dining chain restaurant that offers guests delicious and well made burgers, whole lobsters, lobster rolls and other side dishes. It was first established in London, England and has expanded to various countries around the world.

In August of 2025, I brought and treated my wife and myself for dinner at the Burger & Lobster Bryant Park, located in Midtown Manhattan, right near Bryant Park. We very much enjoyed our dining experience!!!

The restaurantâ€™s staff were very kind and welcoming and quickly provided us with a comfortable dining table. Both my wife and I were impressed with the restaurantâ€™s cozy and intimate features, and we definitely enjoyed viewing itâ€™s soaring ceiling and beautiful and distinct artwork. Its elegant and spacious setting, dim lighting, along with the playing of contemporary music helped produce a very casual and relaxed dining atmosphere.

Our server, Marjorie was very friendly and professional and always checked in on us to make sure that we were having a great time. She along with an additional hostess, made sure that our orders were properly noted, provided a great overview on the menu options, and perfectly addressed our menu inquiries. We thank Marjorie and her colleague for their exceptional service and great hospitality!!!

Last, but certainly not least, both my wife and I absolutely loved our meals. We ordered and enjoyed the â€œChili Garlic Shrimpâ€ appetizer and the â€œBurger & Lobster Combo For 2â€ which consists of a whole lobster, original burger, fries and salad. We found everything to be well cooked, superbly seasoned and delightfully delicious!!!

If you are fan of burgers and lobster entrees along with receiving great service, then you should definitely visit and dine at the Burger & Lobster Bryant Park!!!

Il posto Ã¨ incredibilmente bello. Il cibo delizioso! Il negroni lo facciamo meglio noi italiani (secondo me!) ma la birra Brooklyn IPA molto profumata, gradevolmente persistente sul palato. Gli hamburger Wagyu Ã¨ succoso e da sbranare, ma anche quello tradizionale Ã¨ insuperabile.
Lâ€™aragosta buona, ma non quanto la carne. Il servizio molto attento, ma ci siamo sentiti cacciati, ci hanno messo molta fretta, ci sparecchiavano mentre stavamo mangiando e quando ancora masticavamo lâ€™ultimo boccone ci hanno portato la carta dei dolci. Tutto molto frettoloso e pressante. Consigliato, soprattutto per la maionese al tartufo, hamburger e dolce!

March of 2024 was when my boyfriend and I visited. We arrived on a Thursday and unsure of what time we'd actually get settled we didn't make any dinner plans. After settling down in our hotel we saw Burger & Lobster from our window and we were able to get last minute reservations for 2.

The vibes of this place was perfect. It was moody but not too dark with a modern industrial look that we both loved. We sat at the bar for a few mins to grab drinks before heading to our table. My boyfriend had the Japanese Smoked Old Fashioned, which he really enjoyed, and I enjoyed my bubbly cocktail though I don't see anything familiar on the current menu.

As an appetizer, we got the wagyu steak bites which neither of us were super sure about but we really wanted to try. My boyfriend wasn't the biggest fan of the texture but I really enjoyed them and thought they were delicious. For our main dishes, we both got burgers fries and we split a side of mac & cheese. Everything was delicious and very well cooked! We both really enjoyed our food. My boyfriend, a self-proclaimed mac & cheese connoisseur, devoured the mac and stated it was one of the best he's had!

Next time we're in the area I think we'd both enjoy coming back and trying more of the menu.

Fresh and tasty food, and friendly and funny staff. Burger and Lobster is a staple that one can always trust, whether in NYC or London, or anywhere else itâ€™s always a go to. Got the combo sharing option (1 burger, 1 roll, 1 lobster for 2 people; + salad and fries per person), was a great portion size and tasted great. For what you get and taste itâ€™s reasonable value for money, not an everyday, but one for a special occasion.

The combo for two $86 is the best deal you could get in NYC. When I saw it on the menu i assumed it was 1 salad and fries to share, when our food i saw we both got our own sides i was estatic!
The burger was absolutely delicious it had a tangy taste with the pickles and their seed bun really added a nice flavor. The lobster roll bun was buttery and warm, and the lobster dipped in the garlic butter sauce melts in your mouth.
Our server Jasmine was very kind and welcoming and wasnâ€™t overbearing with her service. Lastly the ambiance here was beautiful the restaurant decor is gorgeous and perfect for date night. 10/10 would recommend this restaurant for locals and tourists

Adam, was our server and he was kind, knowledgeable and professional.  He explained the menu item that we chose and checked on us often. Adam helped  make our experience at the restaurant memorable.  The food was delicious and the presentation amazing. Our meal received a chef's ğŸ’‹!!! Will definitely return again whenever we visit again. Just two, Chicago kids from the Chi enjoying the Big Apple ğŸ.  Adam is a treasure for your organization.  His energy and smile are infectious.!!!

We went here with a party of fifteen for a birthday.  Service was excellent - attentive and accurate. It can be challenging to accommodate a party this size but everyone received everything asked for and in a timely manner.  Shrimp with avocado appetizer was amazing! We ordered the combo with a london burger and the warm roll.  It was super tasty and the sweet potato fries were so good! See pictures below.  I didnâ€™t mess with the cream sauce but the salad was also delish!  Clean and efficient overall space.  Chill atmosphere and we werenâ€™t rushed at all.

Se amate i burger fatti come si deve, questo posto Ã¨ una tappa obbligata! Appena entri vieni accolto da un profumo irresistibile di pane appena tostato e carne succosa. Il menÃ¹ Ã¨ ricco di proposte creative: dal classico cheeseburger, perfetto nella sua semplicitÃ , alle combinazioni piÃ¹ originali con salse fatte in casa e ingredienti freschissimi.

Il pane Ã¨ soffice ma compatto, tiene bene fino allâ€™ultimo morso, e la carne Ã¨ cotta alla perfezione: succosa, saporita e con quel tocco affumicato che fa la differenza. Patatine croccanti fuori e morbide dentro, servite ben calde, e unâ€™ampia scelta di birre artigianali per accompagnare.

Il personale Ã¨ cordiale e attento, ti fa sentire a casa e riesce sempre a consigliarti il burger giusto in base ai tuoi gusti. Lâ€™ambiente Ã¨ accogliente, con unâ€™atmosfera informale che invita a rilassarsi e godersi il pasto.

In poche parole: qualitÃ  altissima, porzioni generose e prezzi piÃ¹ che onesti. Un vero paradiso per gli amanti dei burger!

I have been to B&L plenty of times over the years and have always enjoyed the food and hospitality. However, todayâ€™s experience was truly divine! Sharlene, our server, was so kind and welcoming, making us feel right at home. And the foodâ€”from the east coast oysters to our lobster rolls with salad, fries, and garlic-butter sauceâ€”each bite was sensational. Iâ€™m not trying to be *too* dramatic when I say I had to close my eyes and say a little prayer of gratitude as I savored each bite.

Drinks are on point. Well-balanced and visually impressive. All 6 of us are happy with what we ordered. Oysters are fresh and tasty. We end up having 3 dozens of oysters!
Food is delicious especially the lobster mac & cheese! Oh man! One of the best I've had for so long. Be mindful of the portion though... too big for us non-Americans ğŸ˜‚
David Rojas is really attentive. Glad that we are served by him :)

The burger was delicious.  The Half Lobster was very fishy.  I would recommend the Lobster Roll instead.

Great staff, very kind.

The bathroom was slippery so be careful.
